overview: “The Shield – Justice For All” is on the way this summer and slated to include 9 hours of content that packs in around 20 full-length matches and newly-filmed interview segments with all three members of The Shield. As mentioned previously, the plan is for each Shield member – Seth Rollins, Dean Ambrose and Roman Reigns – to have their own disc in which they are the main focus.
title: The Shield: Justice For All
